=Installation=

==Preparation==

 # First, Install TortoiseSVN.
 # Download latest `msofficesvn_<version>_en.zip` file from Downloads page of this site.
 # Unzip the file and you get wordsvn.dot and excelsvn.xla.

==Office97SR2 to Office2003==

===Excel===

 # Copy excelsvn.xla to the following folders.
  || Office97 SR2 || C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\Office\Library ||
  || Office2000   || ? ||
  || Office XP     || ? ||
  || Office2003   || ? ||
 # Start Excel and check Excelsvn check box in [Tool]/[Add-Ins...] of main menu.
 # [Subversion] menu and the command bar appear.

===Word===

 # Copy wordsvn.dot to the following folders.
  || Office97 SR2 || C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\Office\STARTUP ||
  || Office2000   || ? ||
  || Office XP     || ? ||
  || Office2003   || ? ||
 # Start Word. 
 # [Subversion] menu and the command bar appear.

==Office2007==

===Excel===

 # Copy excelsvn.xla to the following folders.
  C:\Documents and Settings\koki\Application Data\Microsoft\AddIns\
 # Start Excel and select "Excel Add-Ins" in [Office button]/[Excel Options]/[Add-Ins]/[Manage] and click [Go...] button. Add-Ins dialog box appears.
 # Check the "Excelsvn" check box in [Add-Ins available] list box.
 # [Subversion] menu and the command bar appear.

===Word===

 # Copy wordsvn.dot to the following folders.
  C:\Documents and Settings\koki\Application Data\Microsoft\Word\STARTUP\
 # Start Word. 
 # [Subversion] menu and the command bar appear.


=Uninstallation=

==Office97SR2 to Office2003==

===Excel===

 # Start Excel and select [Tool]/[Add-Ins...] menu item of main menu. Add-Ins dialog box appears.
 # Clear the "Excelsvn" check box in [Add-Ins available] list box.
 # [Subversion] menu and the command bar disappear.
 # Delete excelsvn.xla that you copied in installation.

===Word===

 # Start Word and select [Tool]/[Add-Ins...] menu item of main menu. Templates and Add-Ins dialog box appears.
 # Clear the "wordsvn.dot" check box in [Global templates and add-ins] list box.
 # [Subversion] menu and the command bar disappear.
 # Delete wordsvn.dot that you copied in installation.

==Office2007==

===Excel===

 # Start Excel and select "Excel Add-Ins" in [Office button]/[Excel Options]/[Add-Ins]/[Manage] and click [Go...] button. Add-Ins dialog box appears.
 # Clear the "Excelsvn" check box in [Add-Ins available] list box.
 # [Subversion] menu and the command bar disappear.
 # Delete excelsvn.xla that you copied in installation.

===Word===

 # Start Word and select "Word Add-Ins" in [Office button]/[Word Options]/[Add-Ins]/[Manage] and click [Go...] button. Add-Ins dialog box appears.
 # Clear the "wordsvn.dot" check box in [Add-Ins available] list box.
 # [Subversion] menu and the command bar disappear.
 # Delete wordsvn.dot that you copied in installation.
